## PR Submission Checklist

**IMPORTANT**: All items must be checked BEFORE submitting the PR.

### Code Quality
- [ ] Code has been updated and follows DRY principles
- [ ] No code duplication introduced
- [ ] Code is well-commented where necessary
- [ ] No unnecessary complexity

### Documentation
- [ ] Documentation has been updated
- [ ] Documentation follows DRY principles
- [ ] No redundant documentation files
- [ ] SKILL.md updated with any new patterns or requirements (if applicable)

### Testing
- [ ] Unit tests added/updated for new functionality
- [ ] All existing tests still pass locally (`go test ./...`)
- [ ] E2E tests added/updated (if applicable)
- [ ] Test coverage maintained or improved for new code

### Integration
- [ ] Parent Jira issue has been updated with PR link
- [ ] All related issues are linked in this PR
- [ ] Breaking changes are clearly documented (if any)
